R

Reservation - Class in objects
Represents a reservation of one or more tickets.
Reservation(String, String, String) - Constructor for class objects.Reservation
Constructs an empty reservation (no tickets).
Reservation(int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class objects.Reservation
Constructs a reservation without any ticket.
returnCalendar(String, String) - Static method in class database.ParserSQL
Converts the string date/time in a date in GregorianCalendar format.
Route - Class in objects
Represent a route exercised by the company.
Route(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class objects.Route
Constructs a new Route.
